page.title: 15NON POLITICAL ASSOCIATIONS
page.content: The Harefield community Assoc. exists to promote social and family unity within the village.It has 750 members from a total of 7,500 living in Harefield.The main function which it organises, together with the hospital, is the annual Carnival Fete. The Tenants and Residents Assoc. emerged from an earlier pressure grou1p - The Council Tenants Assoc.- in 1980.Its main function is to represent the views of those living in the village, concerning matters of general importance to the community. Not only has this involved the modernisation of some buildings, but also the lobbying for improvements in public transport, the provision of car parking facilities and the maintenance of the character of the High Street shopping facilities.
